scripts.build: tsc && cp -R src/public ../src/dist/public && cp -R src/commands/scripts ../src/dist/commands/scripts && cp -R src/webdriver ../src/dist/webdriver
scripts.build:windows: tsc && xcopy src\public dist\public /E /I && xcopy src\commands\scripts dist\commands\scripts /E /I && xcopy src\webdriver dist\webdriver /E /I
